name: crx3
description: Package web extension into CRX file (version 3) for Google Chrome and Chromium browsers

scripts.prepare: test "${CHROME_BIN}" && npm install --no-save puppeteer-core serve-files || echo 'Puppeteer testing disabled'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run -s test && npm run -s checkStyle
scripts.postproto: echo '/* eslint-disable */' > lib/crx3.pb.js && pbf lib/crx3.proto --no-read >> lib/crx3.pb.js
scripts.checkStyle: eslint index.js lib/*.js test/** bin/*  > ./reports/eslint.txt || echo 'ESLint results saved to `reports/eslint.txt`' && cat ./reports/eslint.txt
scripts.checkAudit: npm shrinkwrap && npm audit > ./reports/audit.log || cat ./reports/audit.log; rm npm-shrinkwrap.json

author: Marcin Konicki (https://ahwayakchih.neoni.net)
